title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label in the UI.

OB: The height of the label does not change immediately after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should update accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR: 
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the UI section where labels can be modified.
3. Modify the font size of a label by selecting a different font size option.
4. Observe that the height of the label does not change in response to the font size modification.
